content.text: 0) Pour cranberry juice into a 5-cup ring mold.
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "Pour"@3:7 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "cranberry juice"@8:23 / FOOD )
		:gol ( tool-0-0 "a 5-cup ring mold"@29:46 / TOOL )
		:_result ( juice-in-mold )
	)
)

( inst-1 / R
	:inform ( ac-1-0 "Freeze"@3:9 / AC
		:duration ( dur-1-0 "over night"@10:20 / DUR )
		:ppt ( juice-in-mold / FOOD )
		:_result ( frozen-juice )
	)
)

content.text: 2) In a punch bowl, combine sugar, lemon juice and orange juice until sugar is dissolved; stir in the ginger ale.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "combine"@20:27 / AC
		:loc ( tool-2-0 "a punch bowl"@6:18 / TOOL )
		:ppt ( ing-1 "sugar"@28:33 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-2 "lemon juice"@35:46 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "orange juice"@51:63 / FOOD )
		:until ( cond-2-0 "until sugar is dissolved"@64:88 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:_result ( juice-mix )
	)
	:inform ( ac-2-1 "stir in"@90:97 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-4 "the ginger ale"@98:112 / FOOD )
		:gol ( juice-mix / FOOD )
		:_result ( juice-with-ginger )
	)
)

content.text: 3) Remove ice ring from mold; float in punch.
content.eamr:
( inst-3 / R
	:inform ( ac-3-0 "Remove"@3:9 / AC
		:ppt ( "ice ring"@10:18 / FOOD )
		:source ( tool-3-0 "mold"@24:28 / TOOL )
		:_result ( ice-out-mold )
	)
	:inform ( ac-3-1 "float"@30:35 / AC
		:loc ( tool-3-1 "punch"@39:44 / TOOL )
		:ppt ( ice-out-mold / FOOD )
		:_result ( ice-in-juice )
	)
)

content.text: 4) Place scoops of sherbet around ring.
content.eamr:
( inst-4 / R
	:inform ( ac-4-0 "Place"@3:8 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-5 "scoops of sherbet"@9:26 / FOOD )
		:gol ( tool-4-0 "ring"@34:38 / TOOL )
		:_result ( FINAL_PRODUCT )
	)
)
